trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.AdamRoleCollection"></xref> class is a read-only collection that contains <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.AdamRole"></xref> items.

The <xref:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.AdamRoleCollection> class refers to Active Directory Application Mode (ADAM) which has been renamed to Active Directory Lightweight Directory Services (AD LDS).
Determines if the specified <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.AdamRole"></xref> item is in this collection.
The <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.AdamRole"></xref> item to search for in this collection.
`true` if the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.AdamRole"></xref> item is in this collection; otherwise, `false`.
The role parameter is `null`.
role is not a valid value.
Copies all <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.AdamRole"></xref> items in this collection to the specified array, starting at the specified index of the target array.
The array of <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.AdamRole"></xref> items that receives the elements of this collection.
The zero-based index in roles where this method starts copying this collection.
A call to the underlying directory service resulted in an error.
The destination array is not large enough to hold the required number of elements.
The roles parameter is `null`.
The index parameter that is specified is out of range of the destination array.
Returns the first occurrence of the specified <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.AdamRole"></xref> item in this collection.
The <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.AdamRole"></xref> item to search for in this collection.
The zero-based index of the first matching item.
-1 if no member of this collection is identical to the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.AdamRole"></xref> item.
A call to the underlying directory service resulted in an error.
The role parameter is `null`.
role is not a valid value.
Gets an <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.AdamRole"></xref> item in this collection.
The zero-based index of the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.AdamRole"></xref> object to get.
The <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.AdamRole"></xref> object that exists at the specified index.
The index specified is out of range of the collection.
